referralDetail: For each person who clicked on your link, you will receive a percentage from each of his deposits to the balance, as well as from all deposits by his referrals up to the 3rd level. Income is unlimited. Even a few invitees can bring you a tangible income.
title: Referrals

noReferralsEmpty.noReferralHeading: There are no referrals here yet

conditions.condition: You will receive 5% of the amount of deposit of the 1st level referral
You will receive 2% of the amount of deposit of the 2nd level referral
You will receive 2% of the amount of deposit of the 3rd level referral
You will receive 1% of the amount of deposit of the 4th level referral
You will receive 1% of the amount of deposit of the 5th level referral
